comments.body:
this test used dataset of only 2 instances, which seems unreliable.
But the new solution has better metrics (weightedFMeasure 0.5 -> 1.0)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +229,233 @@        self.assertAlmostEqual(s.weightedPrecision, 1.0, 2)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(s.weightedFMeasure(), 1.0, 2)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(s.weightedFMeasure(1.0), 1.0, 2)
        # test evaluation (with training dataset) produces a summary with same values
        # one check is enough to verify a summary is returned, Scala version runs full test

comments.body: solver="normal" in this case, so I think totalIterations should be 0.

diffHunk:

        # test that api is callable and returns expected types

        self.assertEqual(s.predictionCol, "prediction")
